item.description:
If you have never seen a dance floor full of tall people, you have never experienced a Beanstalks Dance!! If you aren't used to it, it is quite amazing to be among a large group of other folks who are tall like YOU! Tonight you can join another local Boston organization for Talls - The Boston Beanstalks Tall Club - at their Annual Anniversary Dance on Saturday January 17, 2009, at the Crowne Plaza on Route 9 in Natick.

The BBTC has been dancing up a storm every January for the past 26 years - and 2009 will be no exception. So get yourselves down there, and get ready to party hearty & boogie your b_tts off!


**** This is a public event, open to all adults 21+ regardless of height ****
**** So bring buddies/friends/colleagues to join in the fun! ****



The dance starts at 8:30 pm and it costs $20 at the door.

COME ON DOWN AND MEET SOME NEW TALL FRIENDS!




Any questions, please contact the event hostesses, Linda and Elaine, via e-mail.
item.how_to_find_us: Check the hotel's event/function listing for the ballroom
item.name: DANCING TALL at the Crowne Plaza in Natick
